page.title: 01FARMING
page.content: {Farm Animals: Mainly cattle at least 500 head altogether in this area , Jersey and Hereford being the main breeds. The cattle are mainly used for dairy but some for beef. There is also a poultry farm. {Crops: { }Mainly cereals particualarly wheat and barley with maiz and potatoes being the insurance crops in case thewheat and barley fail.They are also for the purpose of rotation.Grass is an obvious necessty for grazing , haymaking and silage. {Machinery: There are many dairies where machinery is used for speed and cleanliness.There are four combine harvesters,nine tractors, ploughs, tractors,ploughs,cultivators,subsoil cultivators,muck spreaders,spider
